title: Choosing Where To Download LoL
body: I recently put a SSD into my macbook, using my old hardrive for storage. there is not enough room on my SSD to download LoL, so I'm wondering if it would be possible to download Lol onto my storage drive but run it through the SSD. If so, do you know how  could do this? thank you for your help!

replies.body:
Installing League on a separate drive than your Operating System is prone to cause *a ton* of problems and is not something we recommend do. Instead, I'd recommend clearing off space so you can safely install League on your boot drive.

Let me know if you have any questions.
